subject: Account Verification
body1: Thank you for signing up on ${webhost}!
body2: As a security measure, we kindly ask you to confirm your email address to validate its authenticity.
body3: To do so, please click the button below:
body4: Or copy and paste the following link into your browser: <a href="${verifyLink}" style="color: #f97316">${verifyLink}</>.
footer1: If you did not initiate this request, please ignore this email. The account will be deleted within 24 hours.
footer2: If you have any questions, feel free to contact us at ${mailto}.
